Pemkab Purwakarta Dorong Perkembangan Kopi Lokal
01 Nov 2019, 10:12 by Advertorial
PURWAKARTA, (PR).- Selain terkenal dengan sentra penghasil buah Manggis dan Pala, Kabupaten Purwakarta giat mempromosikan Kopi Asli Purwakarta. Melalui Dinas Pangan dan Pertanian (Dispangtan) Purwakarta ada tiga jenis kopi yang akan di dorong yaitu jenis Robusta, Arabica dan Liberica.
Kepala Dinas Pangan dan Pertanian Kabupaten Purwakarta Agus Rachman Suherlan mengatakan, potensi kopi di Purwakarta memiliki peluang yang cukup tinggi, sehingga pihaknya akan terus mendorong agar Kopi Purwakarta lebih dikenal.
"Ada tiga jenis robusta,arabica dan liberica ketiga jenis kopi ini yang akan kita dorong sebagai salah satu komoditas unggulan," jawab Agus di Kantor Dispangtan Purwakarta Jl. Suradireja. Jumat 1 November 2019.
Salah satu upaya agar kopi di Purwakarta bisa terkenal, melalui event dan kegiatan komunitas. Bahkan pihaknya mendorong kedai kopi di Purwakarta untuk memasukan kopi asli Purwakarta.
Termasuk memaksimalkan kegiatan nyuruput bareng, mengikuti kegiatan festival tingkat provinsi maupun nasional, termasuk menggaet komunitas pencinta kopi. Serta memanfaatkan program urban farming on the road sebagai sarana promosi.
"Kita memasukan ke komunitas pecinta kopi, memanfaatkan event - event,termasuk mendorong kedai kopi di Purwakarta untuk menyediakan kopi asli Purwakarta," jelasnya.
Selain itu mendorong cara pengolahan dan penyajian kopi, apalagi pengolahan kopi serta penyajian yang pas akan berpengaruh pada citra rasa kopi tersebut.
"Tinggal kita terus melakukan pelatihan baik pengolahan,penyajian termasuk menata pemasaran.
Perkebunan Kopi di Purwakarta tersebar di dua Kecamatan, yaitu Kiarapedes dan Wanayasa, dengan luas lahan kurang dari 500 hektar. Dengan jenis unggulan yaitu liberica.
" khusus liberica merupakan jenis kopi langka, itu yang kita dorong sebagai kopi asli purwakarta karena memiliki ketahanan lebih baik dari jenis arabica dan robusta," katanya.
Dorong OPD Sediakan Kopi Asli Purwakarta.
Sedangkan menurut Bupati Purwakarta Anne Ratna Mustika, mengungkapkan untuk mendorong serta memperkenalkan kopi purwakarta dirinya meminta agar OPD harus menyajikan kopi asli Purwakarta.
"Kalau bisa harus disediakan kopi asli Purwakarta untuk para tamu, kurangi kopi sachet," katanya.
Lanjut Bupati yang biasa disapa Ambu Anne, hal tersebut bagian dari meningkatkan pemasaran serta membangun branding kopi tersebut. Apalagi Purwakarta memiliki sejarah yang panjang terkait komoditas rempah - rempah termasuk kopi.
"Selain mengikuti event - event, kita juga ingin masyarakat purwakarta mengenal produk kopi asli wilayahnya dong,baik kedai maupun perkantoran dorong agar menyediakan," pungkasnya.***

Purwakarta Regency Government Encourages Development of Local Coffee
01 Nov 2019, 10:12 by Advertorial
PURWAKARTA, (PR) .- Besides being well known for its centers of Manggis and Nutmeg fruit producers, Purwakarta Regency is actively promoting Purwakarta Original Coffee. Through the Department of Food and Agriculture (Dispangtan) Purwakarta there are three types of coffee that will be pushed, namely Robusta, Arabica and Liberica types.
Head of Purwakarta Regency's Food and Agriculture Service Agus Rachman Suherlan said, the potential of coffee in Purwakarta has a high enough opportunity, so that his party will continue to encourage Purwakarta Coffee to be better known.
"There are three types of robusta, arabica and liberica, these three types of coffee which we will push as one of the leading commodities," Agus answered at the Purwakarta Dispangtan Office Jl. Suradireja. Friday November 1 2019.
One of the efforts to make coffee in Purwakarta well known is through community events and activities. In fact, it encourages coffee shops in Purwakarta to include authentic Purwakarta coffee.
Including maximizing nyuruput together, participating in provincial and national festival events, including attracting coffee-loving communities. And take advantage of the urban farming on the road program as a promotional tool.
"We enter into the community of coffee lovers, utilizing events - events, including encouraging coffee shops in Purwakarta to provide authentic Purwakarta coffee," he explained.
Besides encouraging the way of processing and serving coffee, especially coffee processing and the right presentation will affect the image of the taste of the coffee.
"All that remains is we continue to conduct training in both processing, presentation including marketing.
Coffee plantations in Purwakarta are spread across two districts, namely Kiarapedes and Wanayasa, with an area of less than 500 hectares. With a superior type, namely liberica.
"Specifically liberica is a rare type of coffee, that's what we encourage as authentic Purwakarta coffee because it has better resistance than Arabica and Robusta types," he said.
Push OPD to Provide Original Purwakarta Coffee.
Meanwhile, according to Purwakarta Regent Anne Ratna Mustika, revealed that to encourage and introduce Purwakarta coffee, he requested that OPD must present authentic Purwakarta coffee.
"If possible, authentic Purwakarta coffee should be provided for guests, reduce the sachet coffee," he said.
The Regent, who is usually called Ambu Anne, was part of increasing marketing and building coffee branding. Moreover, Purwakarta has a long history related to spices including coffee.
"In addition to participating in events, we also want the Purwakarta people to know about the original coffee products in their area, both shops and office push to provide them," he concluded. ***
